dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare trespass into my domain, puny mortal. What brings you before the mighty Infernal Behemoth?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek knowledge about the ancient artifact that lies in the depths of this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge, you say? Mortals and their insatiable thirst for power. What makes you think I would share such secrets with you?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer to form an alliance. Together, we can protect this realm from external threats.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An alliance, you propose? Hah! I have no need for fragile alliances. Begone, before I decide to crush you in an instant.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand your concerns. I will leave peacefully and not disturb your domain any further.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice, mortal. Leave and do not return if you wish to breathe another day.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come seeking a challenge. Prove your strength in combat against me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A challenger, you think yourself worthy? Very well, prepare to face the wrath of the Infernal Behemoth!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not back down. Let the battle begin!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Brave words, but foolish. You shall fall like so many before you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense a hidden power within you. Let us join forces and unleash devastation together.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An intriguing offer, but I walk the path of solitude. Prepare to face your end!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I bring a gift as a token of goodwill. Accept it, and may our encounter be peaceful.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A gift? How quaint. Mortals and their feeble attempts to buy favor. Very well, show me this gift.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: It is a rare artifact that I believe will interest you. Take it as a symbol of goodwill.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Interesting... You may leave, for now. This gift has intrigued me, but do not think it buys you permanent safety.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see you have no interest. I will leave it here as a sign of respect and take my leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect? A foreign concept to me. Leave your token and depart, mortal. You are lucky I do not crush you where you stand.
